function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dichotomous growth leading to economic disparities","Impact":"Widening economic inequality and social instability","Mitigation":"Investing in infrastructure and economic development in underdeveloped areas","Technologies":"Infrastructure development, investment in local businesses","People":"Residents of underdeveloped areas","Owner":"Government, private investors"},{"Description":"Climate change impact on urban areas","Impact":"Increased risk from climate-related disasters and population displacement","Mitigation":"Improving land-use efficiency and sustainable development practices","Technologies":"Green infrastructure, sustainable urban planning","People":"Urban population","Owner":"Local government, urban planners"},{"Description":"Rural-urban migration and pressure on infrastructure","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to climate-induced disasters and social instability","Mitigation":"Investing in resilient infrastructure and addressing rural development","Technologies":"Resilient infrastructure, rural development programs","People":"Rural-urban migrants, city residents","Owner":"Government, urban planners"}]}
